name: Roy
desc: The next heir to Pherae. The protagonist of this story.
fields: I'm sorry... I let you all down...

Roy returned home to rebuild
the lands in Lycia that were
ravaged by the war. He was always popular
with the people and was well-remembered
long after his tenure as Marquess Pherae.

name: Marcus
desc: A veteran paladin serving Pherae. Roy's instructor in combat.
fields:
Argh... I've come so far...
Lord Roy...please...take care...

Marcus finally retired
upon returning to Pherae.
Although he wanted to live quietly, he was never
able to rid himself of the endless aspiring
knights begging for his instruction.

name: Alen
desc: A knight serving Pherae. Passionate and hot-headed.
fields: I will protect Lord Roy with my life!

Upon returning to Pherae
with Roy, Alen assisted
his lord in rebuilding the trampled land.
His fiery passion and powerful will were
inspiring to many.

name: Lance
desc: A knight serving Pherae. Calm and cool-headed.
fields:
Lord Roy...
I wish you luck...

Lord Roy, Lord Eliwood...
Thank you for everything!

After returning to
Pherae with Roy,
Lance helped his lord rebuild the ravaged
land. Never losing his cool, he helped
lead Pherae to prosperity again.

name: Wolt
desc: An archer serving Pherae. Was raised like a brother to Roy.
fields:
Why so soon...?
I'm sorry, Lord Roy... I can't help you any
further...
No matter what happens, I will protect Lord Roy...

Wolt returned to Lycia
with Roy to assist him in
rebuilding their homeland. Although many
hardships stood before them, Wolt unwaveringly
supported Roy and led Lycia to prosperity.

name: Clarine
desc: A self-centered lady of Etruria. Commander Klein's younger sister.
fields:
No! Please, help!
Klein, my brother...
This is the end! We've come too far to lose now!

Clarine returned home to
Aquileia and lived her life
as she did before the war. Her personality never
changed, but her charm earned her the admiration
of her peers in the Etrurian nobility.

name: Dieck
desc: A former arena fighter from Etruria. Leads a band of mercenaries.
fields:
I'm sorry...
I must take my leave.

Whoa... There's something
you don't see everyday!

Dieck broke up his
mercenary band and
set out to travel on his own. Independent, he
fought in various battles and left many tales
in his wake.

name: Wade
desc: A young man fighting alongside Dieck. Brash and impulsive.
fields:
Oh, man... I really messed
up this time...

This is it! The great battle
I've been waiting for!

After returning home, Wade
worked to cultivate the
land and construct homes in the Isles. His work
continued through many generations and
eventually became the greatest city in the Isles.

name: Lot
desc: A young man fighting alongside Dieck. Calculating and cautious.
fields:
After returning home,
Lot married his childhood
friend and led a fulfilling if humble life.
Although he played a major role in the war,
he rarely talked about it openly.

name: Thea
desc: The leader of a pegasus knight unit from Ilia.
fields:
Juno... Shanna...
I...I fought until the end...

Thea returned to Ilia where
she worked to reunite the
divided pegasus knights. Her diligent work
and leadership paid off, and the pegasus
knights regained their former glory.

name: Lilina
desc: The daughter of Marquess Ostia. Gentle and kind-hearted.
fields:
After returning home,
Lilina became the
marquess of Ostia and rebuilt her land. She
later helped rebuild the Lycian League into
the Kingdom of Lycia, a nonviolent nation.

After returning home, Lilina
became the new marquess of
Ostia, and shortly after, was wed to Roy.
Together, Roy and Lilina united Lycia to create
the prosperous and peaceful Kingdom of Lycia.

name: Barthe
desc: A knight serving Ostia. Humorless and severe.
fields:
After returning home, Barthe
was put in charge of Ostia's
military. Although scarred by Lord Hector's
death, Barthe's strict leadership led the
military of Ostia to glory once more.

name: Bors
desc: A knight serving Ostia. Loyal and dutiful.
fields: I will fight honorably as a knight of Ostia!

Bors returned to Ostia to
help rebuild his ravaged
home. His kind-hearted nature allowed him
to reunite the people once again and bring
harmony and prosperity back to Ostia.

name: Gwendolyn
desc: A knight serving Ostia. Bors' younger sister.
fields:
Wait...
I can't die here... This can't be happening...
You can do this... Just trust in yourself.

Gwendolyn continued her
life as a knight. She was
idolized by many and is remembered as the
first female captain in the Ostian Army.

name: Chad
desc: An orphan from the Lycian border to Bern.
fields:
No!
Why here...? Lugh... I'm sorry...

I have friends I can trust.
There's no way I can lose now!!

Chad gave up thievery after
the war. He traveled across
the continent and dedicated his life to helping
orphaned children. Not many would guess from
his actions that he was once a cunning thief.

name: Fir
desc: A girl travelling around Elibe to hone her sword skills.
fields:
I still have...
so far to go...
I will win. I will win!

Fir set out again to
travel around the world
and train her sword. She became known
throughout Elibe as the next Sword Saint
and her legends were told for centuries.

name: Ogier
desc: A mercenary hired into Ostia's service.
fields:
I know I've become strong...
Now's the time to show it!!

Ogier continued to travel
as a mercenary and his
renown spread across the continent. Even in
his fame, he always held respect for his
comrades in battle.

name: Fae
desc: A young divine dragon from Nabata.
fields:
After returning to Nabata,
Fae was never heard from
again. Many historians are skeptical
that she even existed...

name: Shin
desc: A survivor of a Sacaen clan. Loyal to the Silver Wolf.
fields:
Not here...
I've come so far...

After returning to Sacae,
Shin joined his newly
reunited clan. He was never a talkative one,
but with his leadership and skill with the
bow, he became known as the new Silver Wolf.

name: Sue
desc: The granddaughter of the famed Silver Wolf of Sacae.
fields:
Sound of the wind...
Smell of the grass...
Is this the end? Or is it the beginning...?

Sue returned to Sacae and
resumed her nomadic life.
She never accepted credit for her role in
the war and many said that her ability
rivaled that of the legendary Hanon.

Sue accompanied Roy to
Lycia, where they wed.
She could never cast away her love for
nature, however, and other nobility found
her behavior unusual.

name: Dayan
desc: Known as the Silver Wolf. Chieftain of the Kutolah clan.
fields:
I can...hear the wind in
the meadow once more...

Dayan built a new clan
with the surviving
members of the Kutolah. His efforts were not
without hardship, but his leadership took
the clan to greatness.

name: Karel
desc: The famed Sword Saint. Known far and wide.
fields: Let's see just how powerful this dragon is.

Karel retired to a small
village in the mountains of
Bern and lived his life in peace. Although many
swordsmen came to him for direction, he offered
only small pieces of advice.

name: Bartre
desc: A warrior who cares deeply for his daughter
fields:
After returning home,
Bartre opened a tavern.
His jolly personality ensured success, but
what really kept customers coming back were
the vivid stories of his valor in battle.

name: Larum
desc: A young dancer helping the resistance on the Western Isles.
fields:
It is my time...
I'm sorry...Father...

Larum continued to
travel around the world
as a dancer. Her energetic dancing touched
the hearts of many and her unique style
was passed on through many generations.

Larum accompanied Roy
to Pherae where they wed.
Many voiced unease about a Lycian marquess
marrying a woman of common descent, but in
spite of the criticism, they were happy.

name: Juno
desc: A retired squad leader of the Ilian pegasus knights. Zelot's wife.
fields:
Has spring...
come to Ilia yet...?

After returning to Edessa,
Juno worked to reunite the
pegasus knights. She was later asked to lead
the pegasus knights again, but she declined
and lived the rest of her days with her family.

name: Shanna
desc: A pegasus knight in training. Travelling the world to hone her skills.
fields:
Juno... Thea...
Sorry... I won't make it home...

After the war, Shanna was
knighted and became a full-
fledged pegasus knight. Throughout her career,
she served in positions of leadership and
was eventually promoted to Flightleader.

Shanna gave up her life
as a pegasus knight and
went to Pherae with Roy, where they wed.
Rebuilding Lycia was never easy, but her
energy always encouraged everyone around her.

name: Elen
desc: A young cleric serving Guinivere. Serene and gracious.
fields:
Princess Guinivere...
Please...
Don't give up...

Elen returned to Bern
with Guinivere to reunite
a people devastated by defeat. Her undying
efforts and kind-hearted nature earned
her the title of the Saint of Bern.

name: Yoder
desc: A bishop of the St. Elimine Church who supports Roy's cause.
fields:
Please... Roy... Defeat the dragons...
Save our world...

Finally, an end to the battle
of dragon and man...

Yoder continued to spread
the faith of the St. Elimine
Church. He eventually rose to the position
of archbishop, but he never let his power
blind him from those in need.

name: Elffin
desc: A mysterious bard who supports the resistance on the Western Isles.
fields:
Argh...
This wound... I must retreat...

Let there be peace in
your dying heart...

After the war, Elffin
disappeared without a
trace. Several months after his
disappearance, it was announced that
Prince Myrddin had returned to Etruria.

name: Lugh
desc: A young mage. Grew up in an orphanage destroyed by Bern.
fields:
...I won't lose.
I will protect us all!

Lugh built a magic
school where his
orphanage once stood. He took in orphans
and deprived children and taught them to
use magic as a way of life.

name: Hugh
desc: A mage hired by Etruria. Desperate for money.
fields:
Whoa!
We gotta fight that thing?!

Numerous nations sought
Hugh's service, but he
declined them all and stayed independent.
He always struggled financially, but his
magic skills ensured his legacy.

name: Niime
desc: The Mountain Hermit. Has devoted her life to research and study.
fields:
Heh heh. Well, I had
a decent life...

This is it! The power I've
been searching for!!

Niime returned to her
secluded home in the
mountains and continued her research. It was
rumored she solved many of the world's mysteries,
but she left no records so none can know for sure.

name: Raigh
desc: A young shaman travelling to perfect his dark magic.
fields:
Hngh! In this world...
there are only fools...

This is the demon dragon...!
Such power...! Yes...!

Raigh traveled the world,
studying more about magic.
Through Raigh's efforts, dark magic rose from
obscurity and became widely studied. He was well-
known for being hard on both himself and others.

name: Merlinus
desc: A servant of Pherae in charge of the army's inventory.
fields:
Oh no! I'm getting out of here before
I lose all my goods!

name: Rutger
desc: A young man seeking revenge on Bern.
fields:
Rutger disappeared
without a trace after
the war. He was reportedly sighted in
various places around the continent, but his
name only appears in the records of the war.

name: Dorothy
desc: A girl from Etruria in service to the St. Elimine church.
fields:
Can we win...?
Of course we can!

Dorothy returned to her
hometown and led a
peaceful life. She was never the flashiest
of her comrades, but she always knew what
was most important in her life.

name: Klein
desc: An Etrurian commander and noble. Clarine's older brother.
fields:
I can't die like this...
Clarine...

The long battle comes to
an end.

Klein put down his bow and
became an ambassador for
Etruria, using his charisma to settle many
foreign disputes. While he was in office, he
ensured all nations prospered as Etruria did.

name: Saul
desc: A travelling priest of the St. Elimine church. On an important mission.
fields:
Although the church offered
him the position of bishop,
Saul turned it down and chose to serve
the people in his own way. His behavior
always led to difficult situations.

name: Zeiss
desc: A wyvern rider of Bern. Melady's brother.
fields:
I'll focus all my strength
into this one strike!

Zeiss aided Guinivere in
rebuilding Bern. As he
rose in rank he was criticized for allying
with Etruria, but his firm loyalty to
Guinivere earned him the respect of his peers.

name: Galle
desc: A wyvern rider of Bern. Miledy's lover and Zeiss' mentor.
fields:
I fought honorably...
I accept my death... Zeiss...
Melady...

name: Noah
desc: A mercenary knight from Ilia. Lacks social skills
fields:
Oof... Well,
I did my best...

Wanting to test his
ability, Noah left
Zelot's group and traveled the world as a lone
mercenary. Several nations offered him positions
in their armies, but he turned them all down.

name: Treck
desc: A mercenary knight from Ilia. Sleeping is his passion.
fields:
Trec remained a mercenary in Zelot's troop.
Despite being asleep half the time,
he made short work of any and all
who crossed his path in battle.

name: Zelot
desc: The lord of Edessa. Leads the Ilian mercenary knights.
fields:
So... It ends like
this, then...

Finally, Ilia will
know peace again...

Zelot returned to
Ilia where he worked
to rebuild the land. He eventually united
Ilia into a kingdom and served as the
nation's first king.

name: Astolfo
desc: A spy serving Ostia. Shrouded in mystery.
fields:
Finally, the fun part
can start...

This looks dangerous...
Not that that's anything new.

After the war, Astolfo's
name disappeared from all
records. It was said that he supported
the reconstruction effort in Ostia, but
no one knows what became of him.

name: Cath
desc: A young thief who steals only from the rich.
fields:
Cath set out to travel
the world after the war.
She continued to steal from the rich and
greedy and give it all to the poor. She
was remembered as the Master Thief.

name: Sophia
desc: A shaman from Nabata who can predict the future.
fields:
I can sense...
a sad heart...

After returning to Nabata,
Sophia was never heard
from again. There are no records of Nabata
after the war, so none know how Sophia led
the rest of her life...

Sophia accompanied Roy
to Pherae, where the two
married. Despite her quiet nature, her
informed decisions assisted greatly in the
reconstruction of Lycia.

name: Melady
desc: The leader of Guinivere's personal guard. Unbendingly loyal.
fields:
Princess Guinivere... Please...follow your heart...
Galle...I'm sorry...

For everyone back in Bern...
and for Galle...

Melady returned home with
Guinivere to help rebuild
Bern. Her unbending will and hard work
earned Guinivere due respect, and Bern
began to regain its former prosperity.

name: Gonzalez
desc: A brigand from the Western Isles. Uneducated but compassionate.
fields:
I not afraid!
This time, I not afraid!!

When Gonzalez returned to
his home in the Western
Isles he was not greeted with the stones or
harsh words he was used to but instead with
cheers for the return of a great hero.

name: Garret
desc: A bandit from the Etrurian border.
fields:
A truly powerful enemy!
Haven't met one in years!

Garret quit banditry
and led the life of a
farmer. He worked and tended his crops like an
ordinary citizen and lived in peace. After the
war, he never picked up his axe again.

name: Igrene
desc: A sniper known as the Guardian of Nabata.
fields:
I...fought hard...
at least... Can I go back to the place
I love now...?

Igrene said she would
return to Nabata, but
no one ever heard from her again. None know
for certain where or how she led the rest
of her life.

name: Douglas
desc: The Great General of Etruria. A respected veteran.
fields:
Try as he might to retire
from the military, Douglas
received unending requests from Etruria to
come back. Unable to refuse, he returned to
the palace to lead the Etrurian Army once more.

name: Perceval
desc: The Knight General of Etruria. An imposing man of great potential
fields:
If we take our time...
we can win.

Perceval returned to Etruria
and eventually became the
next Great General. He led a glorious tenure
and was remembered as the very model of an
honorable knight of Etruria.

name: Cecilia
desc: The Mage General of Etruria. Roy's instructor in tactics.
fields:
Etruria... Be a beacon...
for the future...

Cecilia returned home and
helped rebuild Etruria.
Her calm judgment and leadership directed
Etruria to prosperity again and she came
to be known as the Daughter of Etruria.

Cecilia accompanied
Roy to Pherae where
she helped rebuild the battered land. The
two eventually wed, and she continued to
offer him close support as his wife.

name: Echidna
desc: The leader of the resistance on the Western Isles.
fields:
People of the Isles...
Never stop fighting!

This is the end...
Finally, the end...

Echidna returned to
her home in the Western
Isles, and the people were overjoyed to
welcome back their hero. Her hard work
united the Isles into a new nation.

name: Geese
desc: A pirate from the Western Isles seeking vengeance for his crew.
fields:
I hope this'll
be the last battle.

Geese reopened his trade
routes and began to make
a profit. He donated nearly all of the money he
made to the Western Isles, which helped develop
the land, and he became known as the Ocean King.

name: Damas
desc: The leader of a Pheraen group of bandits.

name: Ruud
desc: A knight in control of a castle on the Bern-Lycia border.

name: Slater
desc: A lieutenant of Bern put in charge of castle Araphen.

name: Erik
desc: The traitorous Marquess of Laus.

name: Dory
desc: The leader of a group of brigands in Lycia.

name: Wagner
desc: A retainer of marquess Thria who betrayed his lord.

name: Debias
desc: A knight serving Ostia. Supports the rebellion.

name: Leygance
desc: A commander in the Ostian army. Leads the rebellion.

name: Henning
desc: The leader of a group of bandits that roam around Ostia.

name: Scott
desc: The leader of one of the brigand groups on the Western Isles.

name: Nord
desc: An Etrurian noble in charge of Castle Armagh.

name: Roberts
desc: An Etrurian commander in charge of forces on the Western Isles.

name: Orlo
desc: A bishop of the St. Elimine Church. Oversees the mines on Eburacum.

name: Scollan
desc: The leader of a group of brigands on the Western Isles.

name: Guerrero
desc: A brigand of the Western Isles hired by Bern.

name: Ein
desc: A mysterious figure sent from Bern to assist in the Western Isles.

name: Flaer
desc: A wyvern rider of Bern. General Narcian's lieutenant.

name: Randy
desc: A mercenary hired by Bern. Leads the attack on Nabata.

name: Rose
desc: A brigand living in the deserts of Nabata.

name: Maggie
desc: A brigand living in the deserts of Nabata.

name: Oates
desc: A lieutenant of Bern who led the attack on Arcadia.

name: Raith
desc: A knight of Bern watching over the Etrurian border.

name: Windham
desc: A bishop of the St. Elimine Church who turned against his order.

name: Arcardo
desc: An Etrurian noble. Led the mining operation on the Western Isles.

name: Roartz
desc: The former High Chancellor of Etruria.

name: Martel
desc: A bishop heading one of Bern's units in Ilia.

name: Sigune
desc: A unit leader of the Ilian pegasus knights.

name: Tick
desc: A commander in charge of Bern's standing forces in Ilia.

name: Zinc
desc: An Etrurian commander in charge of a small fort on the Western Isles.

name: Morgan
desc: An Etrurian commander in charge of Castle Eidyna.

name: Monke
desc: The chieftain of the Djute clan of Sacae.

name: Kel
desc: A swordfighter defending Bulgar under Brunnya's orders.

name: Thoril
desc: A survivor of the Djute clan. Hungry for vengeance.
portrait_nid: The Entire Living Population of Sacae

name: Brakul
desc: A survivor of the Djute clan. Hungry for vengeance.
portrait_nid: The Entire Living Population of Sacae

name: Kudoka
desc: A survivor of the Djute clan. Hungry for vengeance.
portrait_nid: The Entire Living Population of Sacae

name: Marral
desc: A survivor of the Djute clan. Hungry for vengeance.
portrait_nid: The Entire Living Population of Sacae

name: Kabul
desc: A survivor of the Djute clan. Hungry for vengeance.
portrait_nid: The Entire Living Population of Sacae

name: Chan
desc: A survivor of the Djute clan. Hungry for vengeance.
portrait_nid: The Entire Living Population of Sacae

name: Peres
desc: A commander of Bern defending the inside of the Shrine of Seals.

name: Narcian
desc: One of Bern's Wyvern Generals. Led the attack on Lycia.

name: Murdock
desc: The head of Bern's Wyvern Generals. Led the attack on Ilia.

name: Brunnya
desc: One of Bern's Wyvern Generals. Led the attack on Sacae.

name: Zephiel
desc: The mighty king of Bern. A talented and gifted genius.

name: Idunn
desc: The Dark Priestess. Seeks to liberate the world by Zephiel's command.

name: Jahn
desc: The final surviving true dragon of the Dragon Sanctuary.

name: Idunn
desc: The demon dragon that was feared by all mankind during the Scouring.

name: Guinivere
desc: The Princess of Bern. Noble and self-sacrificing.

name: Eliwood
desc: The marquess of Pherae. Suffering from an illness.

name: Hector
desc: Head of the Lycian council and the marquess of Ostia.
